programme.title: En kongelig affære
Royal Affair
programme.desc:
En kongelig affære: Directed by Nikolaj Arcel. With Alicia Vikander, Mads Mikkelsen, Mikkel Boe Følsgaard, Trine Dyrholm. A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1276419/","name":"En kongelig affære","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MDE4MTQ4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDgwNDYyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1276419/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RichardvonLust"},"dateCreated":"2012-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best supporting Actor 2012 - by a landslide.","reviewBody":"I had the great fortune to be invited to attend the World Premiere at the Berlin Film Festival earlier this evening of this wonderful film -and opportunities like that don't come often. 

A Royal Affair is Oscar level material in many respects. The screenplay, directing and photography are all superb but the performance of Mikkel Følsgaard as Christian VII of Denmark was perfection. It is so difficult to act a madman acting as if he were sane and I cannot believe any actor taking an Oscar this year could have put up a better performance. Mikkel got the loudest cheer from the audience and he thoroughly deserved it. 

The plot revolves around the machinations of power behind the throne of a simpleton monarch. Christian may be King but he simply wants to play like a child. He is married and fathers a son quite brutally but he loves his dog more than his family. And so a German Doctor is called to treat him. Christian befriends his physician and leaves more and more power in the hands of this foreign commoner. And then the Doctor falls in love with the Queen.... 

It's all true and I won't tell more than that. Just go and see it as soon as you can. It puts Hollywood and Bollywood both straight into the dust bin. Classic drama, brilliant script and a piece of thespian-ism that puts Olivier to task. Just brilliant.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45828,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2012-03-29","keywords":"infidelity,insanity,denmark,enlightenment,sex in public","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1020634393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzcyOTg0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjg3NzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzcyOTg0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjg3NzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2539953/","name":"Alicia Vikander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586568/","name":"Mads Mikkelsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3140538/","name":"Mikkel Boe Følsgaard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064048/","name":"Nikolaj Arcel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136662/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035146/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0122237/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4864795/","name":"Bodil Steensen-Leth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065452/","name":"Rasmus Heisterberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064048/","name":"Nikolaj Arcel"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Light of My Life
Light of My Life
programme.desc:
Light of My Life: Directed by Casey Affleck. With Anna Pniowsky, Casey Affleck, Tom Bower, Elisabeth Moss. Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6063090/","name":"Light of My Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FmMGNiODgtNTAyMy00N2VlLWEyODEtNDViMmRkZDA5Nzc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6063090/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jennifer626"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A lesson on the dangers of yes-men","reviewBody":"When an individual holds too much sway over the creation of a film, the end product almost always suffers. Tom Cruise, well-known for his tight control over the Mission Impossible franchise, micromanaged the 2017 remake of "The Mummy" to death. "Light of my Life" does not pretend to be a big-budget blockbuster, but its quality is undermined for a similar reason.

Casey Affleck is the director, writer, and lead actor in this film. When he wrote the many monologues for the father to sermonize, no one took him aside and advised him to cut their number and length. When he delivered the monologues, no one told him that he needed to make his stuttering monotone more lilting and engaging. And clearly no one informed Casey as director that beginning the movie with a 12-minute (truth!) recitation of a Noah's Ark derivative story would kill audience interest at the outset.

And that is the frustration I had throughout this movie. There were enough variations on the road trip theme that this could have been an enthralling movie. The father and daughter aren't merely trying to survive a post-apocalyptic environment. He needs to protect her from the real-life horrors that young women risk today, but on an astronomically larger scale.

The movie shines when it illustrates these risks and progresses the plot by driving them in their quest for the ultimate safe house. When the pair was forced to gauge the trustworthiness of new companions or they were fleeing from undesired ones, I was engaged and cheering them on. But active moments make up far too little of the film; if you watch the trailer, you've seen clips from most of them. Independent advisors would undoubtedly have counseled Affleck accordingly.

The movie also brushes past the details of both the epidemic and life after the epidemic. When the couple visited a government dispensary or the father mentioned how critical it was to have proper ID, I wanted to learn more about the world had morphed in response to the loss of half of its population. But no, the film doggedly returned to more rambling from the father as the two cower in a foxhole.

I watched the whole movie because I was interested enough in the ending, but I strung it out over 3 days to minimize the tedium. If you decide to see it, fast forward through the first 12 minutes. You'll thank me, I promise.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12299,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-08-09","keywords":"girl dressed as boy,short haired girl,child with gun,girl dressed as a boy,rifle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi560380953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzBjZmU4ZWYtYTAwNS00MWNhLWE4MzMtM2JmYjQwYWNhYmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzBjZmU4ZWYtYTAwNS00MWNhLWE4MzMtM2JmYjQwYWNhYmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Parent and child journey through the outskirts of society a decade after a pandemic has wiped out half the world's population. As a father struggles to protect his child, their bond, and the character of humanity, is tested."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6370548/","name":"Anna Pniowsky"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000729/","name":"Casey Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0101005/","name":"Tom Bower"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000729/","name":"Casey Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319513/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651299/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000729/","name":"Casey Affleck"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le cercle
programme.desc: Un passage en revue, par des chroniqueurs cinéphiles, des sorties et des tournages qui font l'actualité du grand écran. Une émission pleine d'enthousiasme destinée aux amoureux du cinéma.
programme.category: Magazine du cinéma

programme.title: L'homme du labyrinthe
programme.desc: Samantha Andretti, une collégienne, est enlevée par un inconnu dissimulé dans une camionnette blanche. Quinze ans plus tard, la jeune femme est retrouvée, blessée à la jambe, en état de choc. Dans l'hôpital où elle est en convalescence, elle est interrogée par le docteur Green, un psychiatre qui tente de comprendre ce qui lui est arrivé. Il tente également d'établir l'identité du kidnappeur, qui n'a jamais été retrouvé. Bruno Genko, un détective privé autrefois chargé de la retrouver, décide de reprendre l'affaire.

programme.title: Gongjak
The Spy Gone North
programme.desc:
Gongjak: Directed by Jong-bin Yoon. With Jung-min Hwang, Lee Sung-min, Cho Jin-woong, Ju Ji-Hoon. In the mid-1990s, a loyal South Korean secret agent is caught in a political vortex plotted by the ruling classes of North and South Korea." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8290698/","name":"Gongjak","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNiMTAzY2UtYmIwNy00ZGEzLTkwYWYtYjEwZWRmMDBkMjE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the mid-1990s, a loyal South Korean secret agent is caught in a political vortex plotted by the ruling classes of North and South Korea.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8290698/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueboot"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Par excellence. Pay attention!","reviewBody":"This high quality drama is an edgy political thriller throughout, and directed brilliantly by Yoon Jong-bin. The cinematography, the strong cast, the pace, minimalist score and crafted camera work dovetail beautifully to produce a fictional re-telling of a story largely based on truth. The ideologies of two opposed political systems rooted in sister countries of North and South Korea confront one another through the actions of Kim Jong-il (Leader, General and King of the North) and the National Intelligence Service of the South. The quest of the NIS is to determine by whatever means they can devise whether the North is developing nuclear capability, and how close that may be to full militarization. Itself no simple matter! The answer the Director of the NIS is instructed to follow is: send one of his prized assets, a soldier Park (Hwang Jung-min), first to China in the guise of a greedy businessman to build a network of contacts, then if possible, eventually move on to Pyongyang, and Seoul to get close to and manipulate General Kim. Assessing the nuclear threat is agent Park's foremost priority.

That said, the already apparent complicated plot is made more so by believable lucrative and labyrinthine business dealings that have to be set-up and we follow in real time. Agent Park, now businessman Park, is under suspicion from the off and continually tested by an ever cautious communist security service chief. Any mistake by Park in his new persona will lead to exposure and imminent death. The tension and austere nature imposed by DPRK security is palpable, and makes very edgy viewing indeed.

However, while Park progresses and begins to infiltrate into the top echelons other complications arise in his home country. The longstanding ruling Party of 50 years faces a general election in which a new opposition Democrat candidate (allegedly a covert communist sympathiser) wants to reaffirm friendships and form closer trade relations with the North. That level of uncertainty (or as seen by some NIS members, a 'threat' that the South dare not tolerate) compels many of the principle protagonists to either switch their allegiances or change their modus operandi, compounding the cinematic intrigue.

In answer to a few Imdb reviewers who suggest that this movie is slow, they could not be more wrong! To enact the largely historically truthful story in all its glorious intricacies any less accurately by going faster, while maintaining such a superb level of entertainment would be nigh on impossible. This movie is acted slickly and make no mistake is superbly directed. The long build-up in the first half seems necessary to make the story intelligible. Without giving away how the story pans out in the latter half, suffice to say, it makes for an enjoyable, entirely satisfactory, time well-spent coherent watch. Director Yoon Jong-bin especially, and others, particularly the scriptwriters, and supporting cast deserve nominations in the Best Foreign Film category at the Oscars. This film comes highly recommended.

What could prove limiting to its worldwide box office appeal is that for English-speaking audiences the dialogue requires subtitles, and that usually reduces audience figures. Don't let that put you off. 'The Spy Gone North' (aka Gongjak) merits 10/10."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4237,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-08-08","keywords":"spy movie,agent,intelligence agent,asian spy,secret agent","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Spy Gone North","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi939506457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGY5NjE1YzItNzk4Yy00NWUyLWJiNGMtZTZlMTE5MjlkMjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGY5NjE1YzItNzk4Yy00NWUyLWJiNGMtZTZlMTE5MjlkMjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1058565/","name":"Jung-min Hwang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1520129/","name":"Lee Sung-min"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2437361/","name":"Cho Jin-woong"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2151556/","name":"Jong-bin Yoon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0680017/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043365/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0527478/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5312974/","name":"Sung-hui Kwon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5371819/","name":"Myeong-chan Park"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2151556/","name":"Jong-bin Yoon"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

Today Elena lives and works at a seaside restaurant until she meets a teenager who reminds her of her missing son." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9234450/","name":"Madre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ3Y2U4YmMtMWJkMC00ZGFiLWE4ZmMtOWYwOTg3NWExM2E1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"Ten years have passed since Elena's son, then six years old, has disappeared. Today Elena lives and works at a seaside restaurant until she meets a teenager who reminds her of her missing son.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9234450/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"velvet_zoo"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moviegoer's Beware 2* out of 10*","reviewBody":"Great beginning, then fading out into oblivion. programme.title: Voir le jour
Voir le jour
programme.desc: Voir le jour: Directed by Marion Laine. With Sandrine Bonnaire, Brigitte Roüan, Aure Atika, Sarah Stern. Jeanne works in a maternity yard in Marseille. Day and night, she struggles with her colleagues to support the mothers and their babies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11154574/","name":"Voir le jour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjBkMDgzNWUtZmFjMy00MTY2LTljMGEtNjkyMzc3ZjAxMjhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"Jeanne works in a maternity yard in Marseille. Day and night, she struggles with her colleagues to support the mothers and their babies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11154574/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"A nurse's work is never done.","reviewBody":"It could not have come at a better time,this tribute to the staff of a maternity hospital:midwives, nurses, nurses' aides .I could do without Bonnaire's rock singer past and her daughter's clichéed frames of mind ;the gist of the movie , which takes place in the maternity is close to documentary ,and Sandrine Bonnaire is not really the star , all the actresses are admirable: the midwife (Brigitte Rouan ) did not choose this job -she wanted to become a doctor- but her work has become her raison d'être ,in spite of moments of despondency .These underpaid women 's commitment to their work is extraordinary: from the nurses' aide who rocks a crying baby to sleep to Bonnaire who literally saves a baby -and there's won't be any vainglory or legion d'honneur -;one feels the compassion ,the camaraderie ,the solidarity when one of them is held responsible for the death of a baby ,the joie de vivre when ,during a rebellion against the inhuman working conditions (a meager bonus of 20 euros for night work ) , they break into a song "mamy blue" which cheers them up. Even though sometimes they quarrel or meet people at the door shouting against the termination of pregnancy.\n\nThe first sequence sums it up in an admirably succint style: too many patients , shortstaffed nurses and others...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-08-12","keywords":"mother,midwife,maternity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi845725209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg1YTZlZmYtY2ZiYy00ZWFlLThmNTItOWIwZTc5NzVlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg1YTZlZmYtY2ZiYy00ZWFlLThmNTItOWIwZTc5NzVlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094789/","name":"Sandrine Bonnaire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0747690/","name":"Brigitte Roüan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004133/","name":"Aure Atika"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481866/","name":"Marion Laine"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0486596/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0624903/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1125358/","name":"Julie Bonnie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481866/","name":"Marion Laine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8279997/","name":"Laura Piani"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Un aller simple
Un aller simple
programme.desc: Un aller simple: Directed by Laurent Heynemann. With Jacques Villeret, Barbara Schulz, Lorànt Deutsch, Jean Benguigui. I am a civil servant at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. My boss, Loupiac, is having an affair with my wife. I can't take it any longer. I accepted this mission to escape the situation. 'Humanitarian Attaché': I have to take a young clandestine back to his country. He belongs to the tribe of the Grey Men of Irguiz, secluded since prehistoric times in a secret city of the Great Atlas. The kid is amazing. I suspect that his identity papers are fake, that he probably made up this legend. But to believe him is the best way to return him to his home, and it makes me feel good. The power of a legend is unbelievable, once you've decided to believe in it... Being with the kid makes me rediscover life, revive my dreams. And Valérie, the guide he talked me into employing, is about to become the biggest love of my life. Real life now begins..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0242981/","name":"Un aller simple","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk1YmNhMzktZDZkNy00MTQ1LTlkZTItNGY5OTYzNzM3M2JmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg5MDAyNTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"I am a civil servant at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. My boss, Loupiac, is having an affair with my wife. I can't take it any longer. I accepted this mission to escape the situation. 'Humanitarian Attaché': I have to take a young ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0242981/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oakyal"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"fun movie, interesting location","reviewBody":"Caught this movie on plane from Paris to U.S., perhaps not the best time to judge a movie. But, I thoroughly enjoyed the rather offbeat premise. Far from finding the movie predictable, I was constantly surprised by the direction of the plot and the development of the characters, all of whom I cared for deeply by the end of the movie. The setting, in the Atlas Mountains, is stunning.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-05-30","keywords":"bath,female nudity,undressing,based on novel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898317/","name":"Jacques Villeret"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0776424/","name":"Barbara Schulz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0222088/","name":"Lorànt Deutsch"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0382327/","name":"Laurent Heynemann"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070597/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075812/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0019335/","name":"Albert Algoud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0382327/","name":"Laurent Heynemann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885857/","name":"Didier Van Cauwelaert"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: In Search of Greatness
A la recherche de l'excellence
programme.desc: In Search of Greatness: Directed by Gabe Polsky. With Wayne Gretzky, Jerry Rice, Pelé, Ken Robinson. Through the eyes of the greatest athletes of all time, IN SEARCH OF GREATNESS is a cinematic journey into the secrets of genius." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8236398/","name":"In Search of Greatness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRhNTJmMTMtMDNiNS00NDc1LWE3MjgtMmY5MTEwZjdkODBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA0MDc3NDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Through the eyes of the greatest athletes of all time, IN SEARCH OF GREATNESS is a cinematic journey into the secrets of genius.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8236398/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jakebrann"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great show and insight from the stars!","reviewBody":"Not sure how the other reviewers could rate this show so low. This was one of the best documentaries I've seen. The interviews with these athletes and the info is 2nd to none, especially the info from Gretzky. I have 3 sons and I'm going to ask them to watch it. I couldn't agree more that we have ruined creativity from the kids these days with everything so structured and specialized at an early age. Give this show a watch, you won't be disappointed and my be inspired like I was to do things differently.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":455,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Documentary","Sport"],"datePublished":"2018-11-02","keywords":"journey","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"In Search of Greatness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi863680537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0NDM2MWYtM2M4ZS00YTllLTljZjctODlmZjQ2MmZiMjFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0NDM2MWYtM2M4ZS00YTllLTljZjctODlmZjQ2MmZiMjFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":"The official trailer for Gabe Polsky's latest documentary "In Search of Greatness.""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002115/","name":"Wayne Gretzky"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005357/","name":"Jerry Rice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0671446/","name":"Pelé"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2126907/","name":"Gabe Polsky"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0494549/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566160/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2126907/","name":"Gabe Polsky"}],"duration":"PT1H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zombieland
Retour à Zombieland
programme.desc:
Zombieland: Directed by Ruben Fleischer. With Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Emma Stone, Abigail Breslin. A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1156398/","name":"Zombieland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDg0NTQ1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA4Mjg3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1156398/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akerdan"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Actually quite fun","reviewBody":"I just was exiting the theater after seeing '9', which is also worth a look, when my friend and I were offered tickets to a preview screening of Zombieland, which began almost immediately. I had seen previews for this picture, but I'd say this exceeded my expectations, which isn't to say masterpiece, but it was certainly entertaining, and at about 90 minutes, didn't really overstay it's welcome. 

As you might expect for this genre, it's quite gory, so don't go expecting a light 'R' rating. But if you can handle some bloodshed, no, make that a substantial amount of bloodshed - but perhaps I should add in a comic environment - there's some pretty funny stuff here. Woody Harreleson and Jesse Eisenberg make an amusing odd couple and Emma Stone was fine for this material, although she and Abigale Breslin had slightly less to do. 

I'm certainly no expert on the horror genre or the zombie sub-genre, but I can say that this wasn't as scary as Shaun of the Dead, in fact not very scary at all, I may have jumped back just a tiny bit a few times; however I may have laughed more. However I'm sure it does make a difference that I saw 'Shaun' alone on DVD, while 'Zombieland' I watched in a theater full of people laughing, clapping and cheering. 

Let's face it, you know what's going to happen in this flick, but I'm happy to say, plot conventions and all, this delivers enough laughs so if you know what you're getting into I doubt you'll regret laying down the price of admission for this sucker. Should you see it, see it opening night - if I haven't made it clear enough already, this is the kind of movie where the more enthusiastic people in the theater, the more fun it will be. And to end on a very positive note, 'Zombieland' does feature what just might go down in history as the best celebrity cameo of all time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":540788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-01-06","keywords":"zombie,amusement park,twinkie,on the road,actor playing himself","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The "Kick-Ass Girls" of Zombieland","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi179635481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Zombieland featurette"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251986/","name":"Jesse Eisenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1297015/","name":"Emma Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281508/","name":"Ruben Fleischer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1156398/","name":"Zombieland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDg0NTQ1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA4Mjg3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting bruiser in search of the last Twinkie and a pair of sisters striving to get to an amusement park join forces in a trek across a zombie-filled America.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1156398/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"akerdan","dateCreated":"2009-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Actually quite fun","reviewBody":"I just was exiting the theater after seeing '9', which is also worth a look, when my friend and I were offered tickets to a preview screening of Zombieland, which began almost immediately. I had seen previews for this picture, but I'd say this exceeded my expectations, which isn't to say masterpiece, but it was certainly entertaining, and at about 90 minutes, didn't really overstay it's welcome. 

As you might expect for this genre, it's quite gory, so don't go expecting a light 'R' rating. But if you can handle some bloodshed, no, make that a substantial amount of bloodshed - but perhaps I should add in a comic environment - there's some pretty funny stuff here. Woody Harreleson and Jesse Eisenberg make an amusing odd couple and Emma Stone was fine for this material, although she and Abigale Breslin had slightly less to do. 

I'm certainly no expert on the horror genre or the zombie sub-genre, but I can say that this wasn't as scary as Shaun of the Dead, in fact not very scary at all, I may have jumped back just a tiny bit a few times; however I may have laughed more. However I'm sure it does make a difference that I saw 'Shaun' alone on DVD, while 'Zombieland' I watched in a theater full of people laughing, clapping and cheering. 

Let's face it, you know what's going to happen in this flick, but I'm happy to say, plot conventions and all, this delivers enough laughs so if you know what you're getting into I doubt you'll regret laying down the price of admission for this sucker. Should you see it, see it opening night - if I haven't made it clear enough already, this is the kind of movie where the more enthusiastic people in the theater, the more fun it will be. And to end on a very positive note, 'Zombieland' does feature what just might go down in history as the best celebrity cameo of all time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":540788,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-01-06","keywords":"zombie,amusement park,twinkie,on the road,actor playing himself","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The "Kick-Ass Girls" of Zombieland","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi179635481","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTc4Nzc0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5MjI5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Zombieland featurette","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251986/","name":"Jesse Eisenberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1297015/","name":"Emma Stone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000437/","name":"Woody Harrelson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281508/","name":"Ruben Fleischer"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="

Michèle decides to convert to Judaism because she has to believe in something, if not in someone.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0287986/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"orinocowomble"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shallow? That's the point!","reviewBody":"Reading the message boards and some of the reviews for this film, I was amused (and I confess, a bit surprised) at how few viewers seemed to grasp the point. This is the sort of film that you have to think about while watching; it requires something on the part of the viewer. It's not meant to be passive entertainment. Yes, Tatou's character is annoying. Yes, Baer's character is irritating. But that's the whole idea. Tatou's "Michele" is a shallow, superficial fashion model in search of a "great cause" to identify with. (Of course, we know that no top model was ever like that, don't we!) Her constant reading of self-help books and what I like to call "bathtub philosophy" (like bathtub gin, it is home made and of dubious quality) leads her on a "spiritual quest" in the modern sense of the buzzword that spirituality has become--the search for a feel-good factor that will make her feel better about herself, her decisions and her life. Baer's "François" considers himself to be above all need for religion, heritage, even his own history. He's too intellectual (in his own eyes) to need any of those "crutches". And yet he is drawn into a relationship with the dysfunctional, needy Michele because neither one is happy with themselves and both hope to find someone to fill the gaping hole in their lives.

I have known many people of this type personally...they wander from one idea, one philosophy, one country, career or "lifestyle" to another without ever really committing to anything. That's why it says "To be continued" at the end of the film: these people will search forever, without ever seeing what's right in front of their noses. Their personal movie will go on...and on...and on. When the lights come up at the end of the show of their lives, Death will take them totally by surprise.

At first, I found the choppy editing annoying and confusing; it looks like a poorly made end-of-term project for film school. But that also helps make a point. Real life doesn't follow a nice, smooth script, and you can't edit the final rushes to suit yourself. It is what it is, with all its mistakes, out-takes, missed cues and forgotten lines. This is one of those minor films that can grow on you with time, if you learn to see beyond the surface into the ideas behind the emotions. It's only "shallow" if you fixate on the reflections...the water underneath is deep, and full of surprises. No, it's not Oscar material. It will never have mass appeal. But of its kind, it's considerably better than many viewers seem to realise.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2441,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"anti semitism,jewish,veterinarian,judaism,reference to the old testament","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851582/","name":"Audrey Tautou"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0046347/","name":"Edouard Baer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0220017/","name":"Julie Depardieu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0047645/","name":"Pascale Bailly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0850942/","name":"Alain Tasma"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0047645/","name":"Pascale Bailly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738925/","name":"Marcia Romano"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Happytime Murders
Carnage chez les puppets
programme.desc: The Happytime Murders: Directed by Brian Henson. With Melissa McCarthy, Elizabeth Banks, Maya Rudolph, Leslie David Baker. When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1308728/","name":"The Happytime Murders","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTRjMTczMGItMmYxMi00ZThlLTg2ZjAtODgyZTNkN2VmMDlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQwNjY4NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1308728/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"giovannibermudezjr"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Suckit, Big Bird","reviewBody":"THE HAPPYTIME MURDERS is a silly buddy-cop, film-noir, puppet-porno. If Jim Henson's son doing naughty things to his father's toys is your thing, this is the comedy for you. The jokes range from mildy funny to "What the Hell did I just"... Not for the squeamish, there are several instances of explicit puppet on puppet/human action that will make you laugh as much as cringe. The mystery is intriguing, yet predictable. At first entertaining, the constant foul language does eventually become tiring. "I get it. Your puppets cuss." You leave having had some chuckles, but maybe in need of a good, hard bath. There is a fun behind-the-scenes, mid-credits blooper reel. The cast appears to have had more fun making it than you might have watching it. I give this a Solid, "Suckit, Big Bird" rating.\n\n#TheHappyTimeMurders #GioseesMovies #RatedR","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":26328,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2018-08-24","keywords":"wisecrack humor,fictional drug,innocent bystander killed,married interspecies couple,reference to stevie ray vaughan","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bite The Tip","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2384182041","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk2NWNmN2MtODMyMC00OGNmLThkNzktNjM3YjZlMGRiODY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk2NWNmN2MtODMyMC00OGNmLThkNzktNjM3YjZlMGRiODY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When the puppet cast of an '80s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565250/","name":"Melissa McCarthy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006969/","name":"Elizabeth Banks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0748973/","name":"Maya Rudolph"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005008/","name":"Brian Henson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319513/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1787651/","name":"Todd Berger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1032300/","name":"Dee Austin Robertson"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: No Sudden Move
No Sudden Move
programme.desc:
No Sudden Move: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With Don Cheadle, Craig muMs Grant, Brendan Fraser, Benicio Del Toro. A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11525644/","name":"No Sudden Move","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI2ZDQxZDQtZDMxZi00ZWFhLTg1OGYtYmFkMjRkMDc2NDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11525644/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"siderite"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stellar cast and director going nowhere","reviewBody":"This is a heist movie. For any heist movie, you're better off just re-watching "One Crew over the Crewcoo's Morty". The genre is formulaic by design, often involves a cast of very well known people and movies in it should be performance pieces. I mean, no one cares about the loot or what happens in the end, they just want to be entertained by the loops and twists of the story and the way actors make you care about their characters. And on that metric, No Sudden Move is average at best.

Right now I am struggling to mention anything that might be worth mentioning and getting nothing. It's not like people acted badly, but their characters were completely uninteresting and the story went nowhere. Even if it was "inspired" from the story of the catalytic converter and the collusion of all big car manufacturers to keep it off the market, which is true, the rest was complete fiction. And the plot? Just people double and triple crossing each other. No action, no real stakes, no inspiring end. Just Soderbergh being nostalgic over the times when the Ocean's N movies were bringing him a lot of money.

Bottom line: I can't recommend it yet I can't say it was a bad movie. It was just... uninteresting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21314,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-07-01","keywords":"criminal,work,together,job,mysterious","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3678191641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4MTc3YmItZDVkYS00YzNkLWI4YjAtYmUwMTIxODcyZjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4MTc3YmItZDVkYS00YzNkLWI4YjAtYmUwMTIxODcyZjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1955 Detroit, a group of small-time criminals are hired to steal emerging car technology. When their plan goes horribly wrong, their search for who hired them - and for what ultimate purpose - weaves them through all echelons of the race-torn, rapidly changing city."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000332/","name":"Don Cheadle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001125/","name":"Benicio Del Toro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1092086/","name":"David Harbour"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001752/","name":"Steven Soderbergh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0754095/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784743/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

For any heist movie, you're better off just re-watching "One Crew over the Crewcoo's Morty". The genre is formulaic by design, often involves a cast of very well known people and movies in it should be performance pieces. I mean, no one cares about the loot or what happens in the end, they just want to be entertained by the loops and twists of the story and the way actors make you care about their characters. And on that metric, No Sudden Move is average at best.

Right now I am struggling to mention anything that might be worth mentioning and getting nothing. It's not like people acted badly, but their characters were completely uninteresting and the story went nowhere. Even if it was "inspired" from the story of the catalytic converter and the collusion of all big car manufacturers to keep it off the market, which is true, the rest was complete fiction. And the plot? Just people double and triple crossing each other. No action, no real stakes, no inspiring end. Just Soderbergh being nostalgic over the times when the Ocean's N movies were bringing him a lot of money.

Bottom line: I can't recommend it yet I can't say it was a bad movie. programme.desc: Way Down: Directed by Jaume Balagueró. With Freddie Highmore, Astrid Bergès-Frisbey, Sam Riley, Liam Cunningham. Follows a genius engineering graduate who is interested in the Bank of Spain's safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9742794/","name":"Way Down","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTliM2M5MjktZmY2NC00NjdlLWE5YzUtNDU2NzA0MzkyMDNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1Nzg4NjY0._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows a genius engineering graduate who is interested in the Bank of Spain's safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9742794/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nothing we haven't seen before.","reviewBody":"It was good, really well directed and shot, but the story is nothing new. It's basically a tamed down shortened movie version of Money Heist, but not nearly as cleverly or suspensefully written. Plus I feel Freddie Highmore was a poor casting choice. I kept expecting some dumb equations to pop up like they do in the lame TV series he's in, The Good Doctor. Plus he still had that lost-in-space duh look.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16511,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-11-12","keywords":"two word title,engineer,bank heist,bank,bank safe","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi524337433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY0NDk1ZDktZjJmOC00Y2JlLThjYTEtNDVkYmYwYmI1NDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY0NDk1ZDktZjJmOC00Y2JlLThjYTEtNDVkYmYwYmI1NDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Freddie Highmore (“The Good Doctor”) and Famke Janssen (X-Men) star in this globe-trotting, action-packed thriller following a high-risk heist. When an engineer (Highmore) learns of a mysterious, impenetrable fortress hidden under The Bank of Spain, he joins a crew of master thieves who plan to steal the legendary lost treasure locked inside while the whole country is distracted by Spain’s World Cup Final. With thousands of soccer fans cheering in the streets, and security forces closing in, the crew have just minutes to pull off the score of a lifetime. Also starring Astrid Berges-Frisbey (Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides) and Liam Cunningham ("Game of Thrones")."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2793591/","name":"Astrid Bergès-Frisbey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0727165/","name":"Sam Riley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0049371/","name":"Jaume Balagueró"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0733175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0854713/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0733176/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2111814/","name":"Rafa Martínez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1048541/","name":"Andrés M. programme.title: The Bisexual
programme.desc: Leila, new-yorkaise, vit depuis dix ans à Londres avec Sadie, son associée dans la start-up qu'elles ont créée. Le jour où Sadie la demande en mariage, Leila réalise qu'elle n'est pas prête à s'engager et s'en va.

credits.actor: Desiree Akhavan
Maxine Peake
Brian Gleeson
Saskia Chana
Naomi Ackie
Michèlle Guillot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: The Bisexual
programme.desc: Pour le bien de l'entreprise, Leila et Sadie ne montrent pas leur différend à leurs employés. Mais le climat reste tendu entre les deux femmes. Gabe, le nouveau colocataire de Leila lui prodigue quelques conseils. Il l'incite à participer à une soirée avec quelques amis.

credits.actor: Desiree Akhavan
Maxine Peake
Brian Gleeson
Saskia Chana
Naomi Ackie
Michèlle Guillot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: The Bisexual
programme.desc: Sadie s'apprête à prendre une décision importante qui va changer son existence. Gabe doit faire face aux sautes d'humeur de sa petit amie et tente d'en comprendre les raisons. Deniz invite ses amis à passer une soirée tranquille en sa compagnie, mais des événements imprévus rendent l'ambiance explosive.

credits.actor: Desiree Akhavan
Maxine Peake
Brian Gleeson
Saskia Chana
Naomi Ackie
Michèlle Guillot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: The Bisexual
programme.desc: Leila voit sa vie intime révélée au grand jour et doit affronter les réactions contrastées de son entourage. Elle éprouve des difficultés tout particulièrement avec les hommes qui comptent dans son existence. De son côté, Sadie veut éviter tout événement stressant après avoir subi une insémination artificielle.

credits.actor: Desiree Akhavan
Maxine Peake
Brian Gleeson
Saskia Chana
Naomi Ackie
Clare Higgins

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: The Bisexual
programme.desc: Leila souffre de plus en plus de la solitude. Un soir, dans son appartement, elle se remémore ce jour où elle a fait la connaissance de Deniz dans un bar. Les deux jeunes femmes étaient ravies et étonnées d'avoir beaucoup de passions et points en commun.

credits.actor: Desiree Akhavan
Maxine Peake
Brian Gleeson
Saskia Chana
Naomi Ackie

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: The Bisexual
programme.desc: Après une nuit passée ensemble, Sadie avoue à Leila qu'elle essaie d'avoir un enfant. Bouleversée, Leila se rend compte qu'elle éprouve encore des sentiments profonds et tente de recoller les morceaux. Le jour du lancement de Mine arrive à grands pas.

credits.actor: Desiree Akhavan
Maxine Peake
Brian Gleeson
Saskia Chana
Naomi Ackie

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 7562112, Title: Pose, --- Description: Pose: Created by Steven Canals, Brad Falchuk, Ryan Murphy. With Michaela Jaé (MJ) Rodriguez, Dominique Jackson, Indya Moore, Angel Bismark Curiel. In the New York of the late 80s and early 90s, this is a story of ball culture and the gay and trans community, the raging AIDS crisis and capitalism." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7562112/","name":"Pose","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ2ZDMzNmMtZWZmZC00MTFjLWFiMTMtNzJjY2Q3ZjQ3MmI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"In the New York of the late 80s and early 90s, this is a story of ball culture and the gay and trans community, the raging AIDS crisis and capitalism.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7562112/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eileenpa","dateCreated":"2019-07-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing show. Evokes both the drag/club scene and the fear caused by AIDS in the community, particularly for POC, during the 80s/early 90s.","reviewBody":"I remember this time so clearly. The clubs, the slow - then rapid - rise of AIDS, the combination of having the freedom of clubs to go for the LGBT community combined with friends either being terrified they had AIDS - or their despair when they found out they did. Finally, fighting back: ACT UP, drug imports from foreign countries, the AIDS quilt, protest marches.

This show should be watched by every LGBT person who did not live through the AIDS epidemic before the triple cocktail was invented and people could actually survive long-term once they knew they had HIV/AIDS. The world for about 15 years was a terrifying place for the community, and POC were so disproportionately hit, it was horrifying - because the few drugs/treatments available were extremely expensive, and they had two forms of discrimination working against them. This was true even after the triple cocktail was first available.

The one good thing that came out of it was that it brought lesbians/bi women, gay men and trans people together for a common cause: that we not be considered disposable.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"queer,1980s,new york city,ball culture,voguing","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5049751/","name":"Michaela Jaé (MJ) Rodriguez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9500848/","name":"Dominique Jackson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8360867/","name":"Indya Moore"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212151/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314634/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0680695/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6955079/","name":"Steven Canals","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1004299/","name":"Brad Falchuk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1653325849","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcxMGQyOTYtZTEyYS00Y2RiLTk3NDEtNzQzMGUzYzY2ODI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcxMGQyOTYtZTEyYS00Y2RiLTk3NDEtNzQzMGUzYzY2ODI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the final season of Pose, time flashes forward to 1994. Blanca struggles to balance being a mother, a present partner to her new love and a nurse’s aide. Meanwhile, as AIDS becomes the leading cause of death for Americans ages 25 to 44, Pray Tell contends with unexpected health burdens. Pose features the largest cast of transgender actors in series regular
roles."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7562112, Title: Pose, --- Description: Pose: Created by Steven Canals, Brad Falchuk, Ryan Murphy. With Michaela Jaé (MJ) Rodriguez, Dominique Jackson, Indya Moore, Angel Bismark Curiel. In the New York of the late 80s and early 90s, this is a story of ball culture and the gay and trans community, the raging AIDS crisis and capitalism." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7562112/","name":"Pose","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ2ZDMzNmMtZWZmZC00MTFjLWFiMTMtNzJjY2Q3ZjQ3MmI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"In the New York of the late 80s and early 90s, this is a story of ball culture and the gay and trans community, the raging AIDS crisis and capitalism.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7562112/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"robertconyers","dateCreated":"2019-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderful concept that deserves better writing","reviewBody":"I love POSE. Which is why I care about it. It's one of the first trans led, trans positive shows to tell the story of lgbtq+ culture in 80s/90s New York ball scene. Yet as much as I love it, I feel half the episodes are like watching re-runs of Jem and the holograms. There's goodies and baddies for every episode, push down your throat morality lessons, and unrealistic poverty living standards. The main lesson I've learnt is that as long as your beautiful and wear amazing clothes you'll life will be fabulous. Forget hardship, just put on a lipstick, spend all your money on outfits and the gym and you'll be fine. The shows premise is amazing, the actors are great and the background stories for the main characters need telling. Yet we need to be able tell these stories in a realistic way so they can be properly understood, so that the audience can fully explore and comprehend the real drama of people's Lives. I feel Pose takes important issues and works to raise awareness but does so with so much millennial style filtering that the real meaning is lost amongst all the gloss and glitter.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24137,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"queer,1980s,new york city,ball culture,voguing","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5049751/","name":"Michaela Jaé (MJ) Rodriguez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9500848/","name":"Dominique Jackson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8360867/","name":"Indya Moore"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212151/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314634/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0680695/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6955079/","name":"Steven Canals","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1004299/","name":"Brad Falchuk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1653325849","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcxMGQyOTYtZTEyYS00Y2RiLTk3NDEtNzQzMGUzYzY2ODI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcxMGQyOTYtZTEyYS00Y2RiLTk3NDEtNzQzMGUzYzY2ODI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the final season of Pose, time flashes forward to 1994. Evokes both the drag/club scene and the fear caused by AIDS in the community, particularly for POC, during the 80s/early 90s.","reviewBody":"I remember this time so clearly. The clubs, the slow - then rapid - rise of AIDS, the combination of having the freedom of clubs to go for the LGBT community combined with friends either being terrified they had AIDS - or their despair when they found out they did. Finally, fighting back: ACT UP, drug imports from foreign countries, the AIDS quilt, protest marches.

This show should be watched by every LGBT person who did not live through the AIDS epidemic before the triple cocktail was invented and people could actually survive long-term once they knew they had HIV/AIDS. The world for about 15 years was a terrifying place for the community, and POC were so disproportionately hit, it was horrifying - because the few drugs/treatments available were extremely expensive, and they had two forms of discrimination working against them. This was true even after the triple cocktail was first available.

The one good thing that came out of it was that it brought lesbians/bi women, gay men and trans people together for a common cause: that we not be considered disposable.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"queer,1980s,new york city,ball culture,voguing","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5049751/","name":"Michaela Jaé (MJ) Rodriguez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9500848/","name":"Dominique Jackson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8360867/","name":"Indya Moore"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0212151/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314634/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0680695/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6955079/","name":"Steven Canals","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1004299/","name":"Brad Falchuk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1653325849","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcxMGQyOTYtZTEyYS00Y2RiLTk3NDEtNzQzMGUzYzY2ODI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcxMGQyOTYtZTEyYS00Y2RiLTk3NDEtNzQzMGUzYzY2ODI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the final season of Pose, time flashes forward to 1994. programme.title: House of Series
programme.desc: Aux Etats-Unis, de plus en plus de séries s'intéressent aux rouages de la politique et aux coulisses du pouvoir à la Maison-Blanche. En 1999, The West Wing a été l'une des premières fictions à dépeindre le quotidien du président américain et de son équipe. Cette série culte a inspiré nombre de scénaristes qui ont donné naissance à "House of cards", "Veep", "The loudest voice", ou encore "The Comey rule". Pourquoi la Maison-Blanche et son locataire inspirent-ils tant le sérail de la fiction ? Ce documentaire analyse cette tendance à travers les témoignages de producteurs et de showrunners comme Elie Attie (The west Wing), ou encore Michael Kelly (The Comey rule).
programme.category: Cinéma

programme.title: Shadowplay
Shadowplay
programme.desc:
Shadowplay: With Taylor Kitsch, Michael C. Hall, Logan Marshall-Green, Nina Hoss. Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8879894/","name":"Shadowplay","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M1YzFiYzAtNGUwYS00MmE1LTg2ZTEtM2FkYjg1NTgxMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg5MzIyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8879894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JottaH"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do not trust the negative reviews.","reviewBody":"People saying that it shows 1 group as good or others as bad, have either not seen all the episodes, or they're biased to hell and back. The show depicts villains and heroes in every corner. British, Russian, American, German, French... Perhaps it is a sign of the times that we live in that people choose to see just one side, but I assure you that it hits in all directions. It also shows humanity and decency from all directions.

This show is grand. It has mystery, the violence is realistic and used to great effect, the characters are well written and the connection to real events has a unique spin in that it depicts the post-war time of Europe rather than WWII. The set design alone is worthy of all the praise possible. So is the use of actual British, French, American, Russian and German actors. It would've been easy to just stick a bunch of Swedish and English actors into it all and call it a day. But they didn't, because this show is so clearly a labour of love. The one thing that confuses me, and surely others, is why it's called different names depending on region. To me as a Swede it is called, The Defeated, to others it's called Shadowplay. It causes unnecessary confusion for viewers, but those that do watch it all the way through tend to give it positive ratings.

Give it a chance. It is the first show I watched in 2021, and it set a VERY high bar for any upcoming shows to reach.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3049,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-30","keywords":"police protagonist,american cop abroad,american in germany,post war germany,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2018237/","name":"Taylor Kitsch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334869/","name":"Logan Marshall-Green"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0352167/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078814/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi500744473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)"}}</script><metacontent="

Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8879894/","name":"Shadowplay","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M1YzFiYzAtNGUwYS00MmE1LTg2ZTEtM2FkYjg1NTgxMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg5MzIyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8879894/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"JottaH","dateCreated":"2021-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do not trust the negative reviews.","reviewBody":"People saying that it shows 1 group as good or others as bad, have either not seen all the episodes, or they're biased to hell and back. The show depicts villains and heroes in every corner. British, Russian, American, German, French... Perhaps it is a sign of the times that we live in that people choose to see just one side, but I assure you that it hits in all directions. It also shows humanity and decency from all directions.

This show is grand. It has mystery, the violence is realistic and used to great effect, the characters are well written and the connection to real events has a unique spin in that it depicts the post-war time of Europe rather than WWII. The set design alone is worthy of all the praise possible. So is the use of actual British, French, American, Russian and German actors. It would've been easy to just stick a bunch of Swedish and English actors into it all and call it a day. But they didn't, because this show is so clearly a labour of love. The one thing that confuses me, and surely others, is why it's called different names depending on region. To me as a Swede it is called, The Defeated, to others it's called Shadowplay. It causes unnecessary confusion for viewers, but those that do watch it all the way through tend to give it positive ratings.

Give it a chance. It is the first show I watched in 2021, and it set a VERY high bar for any upcoming shows to reach.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3049,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-30","keywords":"police protagonist,american cop abroad,american in germany,post war germany,world war two","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2018237/","name":"Taylor Kitsch","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.title: Nielegalni
Illegals
programme.desc: Nielegalni: With Grzegorz Damiecki, Agnieszka Grochowska, Sylwia Juszczak, Wojciech Zoladkowicz. Konrad Wolski, head of the Q department, an elite Polish intelligence unit, taking over a Belarusian arms dealer in Istanbul, learns about a terrorist attack planned in Sweden. The weapon to be used in the attack is to come from the Soviet arsenal hidden in Belarus. Konrad immediately launches Travis, a Polish spy secret in the Minsk KGB, to obtain intelligence information that will frustrate the terrorist plan. The issue is complicated by the fact that Travis has just been exposed by one of the Belarusian KGB officers. Subject to financial blackmail, he will not remain in his position for a long time - the mission of his immediate evacuation goes to Minsk Sara, an officer of the Polish Intelligence Agency. At the same time, a retired general of Belarusian services in Warsaw is blackmailing the Prime Minister of the Republic of Poland. The officers of the Foreign Intelligence Agency must at all costs take over archival materials incriminating the head of the Polish government. All roads lead to Minsk. A murderous game begins with time." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8589990/","name":"Nielegalni","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwNzQyMjQ3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDE2MzEzNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Konrad Wolski, head of the Q department, an elite Polish intelligence unit, taking over a Belarusian arms dealer in Istanbul, learns about a terrorist attack planned in Sweden. programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Après l'arrestation d'un important trafiquant d'armes Biélorusse à Instanbul, Konrad Wolski apprend qu'un attentat est en préparation sur le sol suédois. Les armes censées être utilisées lors de l'attaque proviendraient d'un arsenal soviétique secret en Biélorussie. Le chef de l'unité d'élite des services secrets polonais contacte immédiatement Travis, l'un de ses agents dormant au KGB. Mais la couverture de ce dernier semble être grillée et Wolski envoie alors Sara, un autre agent polonais afin de l'exfiltrer. Au même moment, un ancien général Biélorusse menace le Premier ministre Polonais...

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki
Agnieszka Grochowska
Sylwia Juszczak
Filip Plawiak
Andrzej Seweryn

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Après la mort de Stepanovitch, les renseignements polonais sont persuadés que l'attaque est liée à la mission de Travis. Le département Q cherche à comprendre qui a fait chanter le Premier Ministre. Ce dernier est interrogé et avoue avoir subi une tentative de recrutement mais nie avoir collaboré avec qui que ce soit. Il charge les renseignements de retrouver les documents liés à Klimovich et de les détruire. Konrad Wolski est persuadé que le Premier Ministre cache quelque chose...

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki
Agnieszka Grochowska
Sylwia Juszczak
Filip Plawiak
Andrzej Seweryn

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Alors que Nadia soupçonne Travis de toucher des pots de vins, ce dernier lui avoue qu'il est une taupe au KGB et qu'il travaille pour les services secrets polonais. Malheureusement sa fiancée est enlevée quelques heures plus tard. Furieuse que Travis ait révélé son identité, Sara craint que Nadia craque et ne balance tout ce qu'elle sait aux Russes. Elle informe immédiatement Konrad Wolski de la situation..

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki
Agnieszka Grochowska
Sylwia Juszczak
Filip Plawiak
Ireneusz Czop

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Travis est toujours chargé de retrouver les archives et promet à Nadia que ce sera sa dernière mission avant de quitter la Russie. Ce dernier semble en effet être le seul espoir de Wolski. Pendant ce temps, Konrad apprend qu'une société Biélorusse cherche à acheter des actions identiques à celles que les Russes avaient essayé d'acquérir..

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki
Agnieszka Grochowska
Sylwia Juszczak
Filip Plawiak
Andrzej Seweryn

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Après la mort de Travis, Konrad Wolski doit honorer sa promesse et s'occuper de Nadia et du bébé. Rapidement des photos du corps de l'agent se répandent sur internet ce qui embarrasse le gouvernement qui cherche à tout prix à découvrir l'auteur des faits. Ewa, de son côté, se retrouve complètement sous pression tandis que Konrad Wolski retrouve son père et apprend que celui-ci est suivi par les renseignements suédois depuis plusieurs années...

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki
Agnieszka Grochowska
Sylwia Juszczak
Andrzej Seweryn
Jan Frycz

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Alors qu'Ewa poursuit sa descente aux enfers et continue à se droguer, Konrad révèle à son père qu'il est malade et soupçonne ce dernier de lui cacher quelque chose. Pendant ce temps, Marcin et Nasim suivent la piste d'une salle de sport gérée par Muhamedov, alias Safir Al-Salam, et disparaissent lors d'un guet-apens. Le SAP0 et la division Q tentent de localiser sa planque pour porter secours à leurs deux agents. Jagan, de son côté, aide Hans à faire évader Abdul de l'hôpital, mais exige une contrepartie. Sara, enfin, doit trouver de l'argent pour faire opérer le fils de Nadia...

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki
Agnieszka Grochowska
Sylwia Juszczak
Andrzej Seweryn
Tomasz Schuchardt

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Après avoir rencontré le petit-ami de sa fille, qui n'est autre que son dealer, Ewa a un accident. Sara, de son côté, avoue à son fiancé qu'elle travaille pour les services secrets polonais. Après la mort de Muhamedov, Marsin suspecte ce dernier de ne pas être Safir Al- Salam tandis qu'Ewa prévient Konrad qu'il est victime d'un coup monté et qu'elle craint pour sa sécurité. Ce dernier est immédiatement interrogé à son retour de Suède...

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Alors que les affaires internes enquêtent sur le département Q, Sara remonte la piste d'un Tchétchène. Le père de Konrad, de son côté, semble très affecté par la mort d'Abdul. Il fait une révélation sur les Russes à son fils..

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damiecki

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Illegals
programme.desc: Konrad veut tout faire pour identifier la taupe qui a tenté de le discréditer. Il décide de s'associer à son père pour faire échouer l'attaque à Stockholm avant que ce dernier ne soit exfiltré par les Russes. Kuba, de son côté, est traqué par les services de renseignements qui le soupçonnent d'être le meurtrier d'Aslan Sadajew..

programme.category: Série de suspense

programme.title: Le cercle séries
programme.desc: Animée par une petite bande de chroniqueurs passionnés, cette émission mensuelle consacrée exclusivement aux séries passe en revue les sorties et les tournages qui font l'actualité des séries à succès et celles qui méritent d'être découvertes. Pourquoi certaines fictions accrochent et touchent plus que d'autres ? Les images seront analysés afin d'apporter un point de vue technique. Autour des séries évènements, des découvertes et des pépites, les débats sont garantis sans spoilers.
