programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
Jackpot
programme.desc:
What Happens in Vegas: Directed by Tom Vaughan. With Cameron Diaz, Ashton Kutcher, Rob Corddry, Lake Bell. A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1033643/","name":"What Happens in Vegas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQyYjE3YjYtNjJkNi00MWY0LWJhNDctZDRmOTY5ZGJiNDI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1033643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DICK STEEL"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Nutshell Review: What Happens In Vegas","reviewBody":"My only trip to the US (not counting the toddler days) where I can remember what the heck I was doing, was back in December 2005 (gee, time flies!) where I spent a total of 7 full days trawling the streets as well as the casinos up and down the Strip and its outskirts, and seriously, it's never as sexy as that portrayed in the movies (or that television series), though you'd truly never really run out of things to do, despite everything being overly expensive at tourist prices. I think I still possess a mental map of everything on the Strip!

And of course, Vegas is famous amongst other things besides the Elvis impersonators, live entertainment etc, is the ability to conduct quicky marriages, which is what Ashton Kutcher's Jack Fuller and Cameron Diaz's Joy McNally get themselves into during a night of drunken stupor and cheap dares, two lonely souls who journey to Sin City as an escapism from their failed lives, where you can enjoy all the pleasures the city have to offer, before the drudge comes kicking in when you receive that credit card bill.

So begins the story when the duo find themselves in a situation to annul their marriage given a night of impulse that they cannot remember, but cannot do so when McNally's quarter was inserted into a jackpot machine by Fuller, and that brought them a cool 3 million dollars jackpot. Which they can't agree how to split the money, and a quirky judge sentenced them to 6 months "hard marriage" to work through their marital vows, before their frozen cash can be touched. As what the trailer had already explicitly spelt out, it's War of the Roses in Mr and Mrs Smith styled couch-therapy sessions by Queen Latifah, with comedy ranging from the slapstick, to the plain juvenile toilet tricks.

Attempts to elevate the movie and give the characters more depth, come in the form of Jack Fuller learning to believe in himself and to shed his playboy, non-committal ways, and with Joy McNally having to learn to let her hair down, lighten up, and basically doing something she loves rather than to continue doing things that she dislikes, in true "live your dream" fashion. And throw in a quirky boss and ideal parents into the mix, you'd have a whole host of supporting cast to boost variety in this rather predictable tale, where you can see the outcome shining brightly like a star in a moonless night.

I thought Ashton Kutcher and Cameron Diaz could be playing themselves, i.e. one's dating an older woman, the other other no qualms in dating younger men. Well, at least their characters had never felt the need to reveal their ages, but you can tell Diaz is a spring chicken no longer since her big screen debut in The Mask. Typical of all her roles, Diaz again plays a ditzy blonde with quirky skill sets, and I thought somebody should really consider giving her a role in an action movie, since she has on display, really menacing looking biceps, and a scene where she got to show off her combo moves of a right hook and reverse roundhouse kick.

Kutcher on the other hand is, well, Kutcher from Punk'd, with nothing really new offered in his role of the smooth talking slacker with brooding good looks. Instead, the one who stole the show was sidekick Rob Corddry as Hater, Fuller's best friend and lawyer. He would already be familiar to some as the crazy Homeland Security agent in Harold and Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay, and I'd stick my neck out to say this is one guy to watch over the next few comedic movies, as he totally let it rip in this movie with his crazy antics.

At best, What Happens in Vegas is ideal for those itching for yet another formulaic romantic- comedy from the factories of Hollywood, or for those who missed out on the hot tickets for Speed Racer. Stay behind after the end credits roll for a final coda. There are 2 at the beginning of the end credits, but hold out right until the end before you decide to make for the exit.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":168924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-05-07","keywords":"jackpot,wedding,drunkenness,hit in the crotch,father son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Happens in Vegas ... Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2092040473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NzI0MzIwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk0NDc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NzI0MzIwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk0NDc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first trailer for What Happens in Vegas ... "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1117791/","name":"Rob Corddry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891114/","name":"Tom Vaughan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1401416/","name":"Dana Fox"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1033643/","name":"What Happens in Vegas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzQyYjE3YjYtNjJkNi00MWY0LWJhNDctZDRmOTY5ZGJiNDI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1033643/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DICK STEEL","dateCreated":"2008-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Nutshell Review: What Happens In Vegas","reviewBody":"My only trip to the US (not counting the toddler days) where I can remember what the heck I was doing, was back in December 2005 (gee, time flies!) where I spent a total of 7 full days trawling the streets as well as the casinos up and down the Strip and its outskirts, and seriously, it's never as sexy as that portrayed in the movies (or that television series), though you'd truly never really run out of things to do, despite everything being overly expensive at tourist prices. I think I still possess a mental map of everything on the Strip!

And of course, Vegas is famous amongst other things besides the Elvis impersonators, live entertainment etc, is the ability to conduct quicky marriages, which is what Ashton Kutcher's Jack Fuller and Cameron Diaz's Joy McNally get themselves into during a night of drunken stupor and cheap dares, two lonely souls who journey to Sin City as an escapism from their failed lives, where you can enjoy all the pleasures the city have to offer, before the drudge comes kicking in when you receive that credit card bill.

So begins the story when the duo find themselves in a situation to annul their marriage given a night of impulse that they cannot remember, but cannot do so when McNally's quarter was inserted into a jackpot machine by Fuller, and that brought them a cool 3 million dollars jackpot. Which they can't agree how to split the money, and a quirky judge sentenced them to 6 months "hard marriage" to work through their marital vows, before their frozen cash can be touched. As what the trailer had already explicitly spelt out, it's War of the Roses in Mr and Mrs Smith styled couch-therapy sessions by Queen Latifah, with comedy ranging from the slapstick, to the plain juvenile toilet tricks.

Attempts to elevate the movie and give the characters more depth, come in the form of Jack Fuller learning to believe in himself and to shed his playboy, non-committal ways, and with Joy McNally having to learn to let her hair down, lighten up, and basically doing something she loves rather than to continue doing things that she dislikes, in true "live your dream" fashion. And throw in a quirky boss and ideal parents into the mix, you'd have a whole host of supporting cast to boost variety in this rather predictable tale, where you can see the outcome shining brightly like a star in a moonless night.

I thought Ashton Kutcher and Cameron Diaz could be playing themselves, i.e. one's dating an older woman, the other other no qualms in dating younger men. Well, at least their characters had never felt the need to reveal their ages, but you can tell Diaz is a spring chicken no longer since her big screen debut in The Mask. Typical of all her roles, Diaz again plays a ditzy blonde with quirky skill sets, and I thought somebody should really consider giving her a role in an action movie, since she has on display, really menacing looking biceps, and a scene where she got to show off her combo moves of a right hook and reverse roundhouse kick.

Kutcher on the other hand is, well, Kutcher from Punk'd, with nothing really new offered in his role of the smooth talking slacker with brooding good looks. Instead, the one who stole the show was sidekick Rob Corddry as Hater, Fuller's best friend and lawyer. He would already be familiar to some as the crazy Homeland Security agent in Harold and Kumar Escape From Guantanamo Bay, and I'd stick my neck out to say this is one guy to watch over the next few comedic movies, as he totally let it rip in this movie with his crazy antics.

At best, What Happens in Vegas is ideal for those itching for yet another formulaic romantic- comedy from the factories of Hollywood, or for those who missed out on the hot tickets for Speed Racer. Stay behind after the end credits roll for a final coda. There are 2 at the beginning of the end credits, but hold out right until the end before you decide to make for the exit.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":168924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-05-07","keywords":"jackpot,wedding,drunkenness,hit in the crotch,father son relationship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Happens in Vegas ... Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0098844/","name":"Law & Order","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzViNWZjZTQtMzNkMi00ZTIxLWE1NmMtMmUwOTg4OWMyYmI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0098844/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"domino1003","dateCreated":"2004-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch it for Briscoe and McCoy!","reviewBody":"To be honest, I didn't become a real fan of the series until Jerry Orbach (Detective Briscoe)and Sam Waterston(EADA McCoy)came into the picture. This is when the series starts to pick up steam. Watching the show, you can't help but laugh at Briscoe's remarks or feel the passion of McCoy. Both of these men want justice, and will do everything within limits to bring the wrongdoers to justice. What I really like about the show is the wonderful twists and turns that they throw to the audience, as well as the "ripped from the headlines" episodes. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 5868826, Title: La peste, --- Description: La peste: Created by Rafael Cobos, Alberto Rodríguez. With Pablo Molinero, Patricia López Arnaiz, Sergio Castellanos, Cecilia Gómez. During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races, where 50 different languages were spoken, and all the gold from America arrived into its port. It was one of the smelliest, most beautiful cities in the world, and the setting for this unique, character-driven thriller." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5868826/","name":"La peste","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI0NThlN2MtYTcyYS00MGU1LTgxNzItNTljYzU4MDZjYjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg3NzY0NDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it w","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5868826/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2020-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A peculiar, unique and character-driven thriller with wonderful cinematography and nice acting","reviewBody":"Good but dark series formed by 2 seasons, 12 episodes , being very well set , nicely played and from visual point of view it is magnificent. Spain had become an empire by 1500's under Catholic Kings : Isabel and Fernando , Charles I and after Felipe II , the most poweful country in Europe and all over the world at the time . It is set in Sevilla, 16th century, one of the most marvellous and smelliest cities in the world , it is a time of plague , pursuit , superstition, as well as hyper-religiosity and during a terrible plague epidemic . There appears Mateo Nuñez : Pablo Molinero , he is a condemned by Inquisition, as a high-authority priest named Celso de Guevara : Manolo Solo assigns him to investigate a series of murders happened in the noisy city of Seville where more than forty different languages were spoken and all the gold from America arrived on its por t. In the midst of a dirty atmosphere suffocated by mistrust and betrayals on the order of the day , he will have to discover the author of such astonishing and grisly killings . The second season deals with Mateo Nuñez and Teresa Pinelo : Patricia López Arnaiz , who face off Maria de la O : Stefania de los Santos , and a dangerous and bloody criminal organization, Mafia-alike, called La Garduña operating in Sevilla by human trafficking , prostitution and labouring exploitation.

Nice costumer, dense and painfully realistic mystery thriller with solid performance , enjoyable locations , impeccable scenarios and lavishly filmed. Set in the post-Medieval Seville with its social constitution struck by the plague , it was one of the main cities of the Western world , known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races and people of all kinds and strangest conditions . Do not expect luxurious palaces , sweet Renaissance settings and gorgeous decoration seen in other foreign series such Versalles, The Borgia , Michael Hirst's Tudor or Richard Madden's The Medici. On the contrary, you can appreciate sinister environments , brothels , dirtiness, bowery, city slums and the deepest poverty. As far as I'm concerned the especial writing is pretty well , being its authentic creators Rafael Cobos and Alberto Rodriguez. Convincingly performed by Pablo Molinero as Matthew who investigates the found corpses of several murdered people as an omen of the end of the world . Matthew will have to find out who is the author of a series of diabolical crimes committed against the high places of Sevillian society . Otherwise , he will not find the forgiveness of the Holy Office and the Inquisition as he will decide to investigate it at whatever means. Being finely accompanied by Patricia López Arnaiz as a mysterious factory owner , Paco Tous as her administrator assistant , Paco León, Manolo Solo, Cecilia Gómez, Sergio Castellanos, Manuel Morón , Melina Matthews, Estefania de Santos, Jesús Carroza, Julián Villagrán, Antonio Dechent, Luis Callejo , among others.

It displays an evocative and atmospheric musical score by Julio de la Rosa. It contains picturesque cinematography by cameramen Rau Steve and Andreu Adamo Rubiralta. Shot on several locations as Utrera, Coria del Rio, Dos Hermanas Carmona, Santiponce, Alcala de Guadaira, Gelves, Mairena, Puebla de Rio, Sevilla, Trujillo, Caceres, Palos de la Frontera, Huelva, Cuevas de Almanzora, Almeria, and Toledo. And we can find the real interiors of the Sevillian Palaces, Casa Contratation of Sevilla and sightseeing as the riverside, Giralda, Torre del Oro, Cathedral and other buildings, monuments by means of CGI. This surprising crime drama was well directed by Alberto Rodriguez. He is considered to be one of the best Spanish filmmakers, including notorious films as Grupo 7, Factor Pilgrim, 7 Virgins, The suit , El hombre de las 1000 caras, being his biggest hit : Marshland . Rating : above average, 7/10 for the accuracy in depicting the XVI century city , as the money are not waste, though not for too squeamish watchers due to its sour seeing of poorness, sleazy events, nudism , heinous killings and extreme realism .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1857,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-12","keywords":"plague,murder investigation,death,violence,blood","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1944825/","name":"Pablo Molinero","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3802082/","name":"Patricia López Arnaiz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1525783/","name":"Sergio Castellanos"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296182/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0544623/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1943791/","name":"Rafael Cobos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735705/","name":"Alberto Rodríguez"]</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mare of Easttown
Mare of Easttown
Mare of Easttown
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 S1 E1 Miss Lady Hawk persönlich
programme.desc: Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfloro"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"About Kate Winslet's mastery of accents","reviewBody":"If you think about an actress who has convincingly portrayed characters with distinctive accents, you probably think of Meryl Streep (Sophie's Choice, The Iron Lady, etc.). But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. "}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 10155688, Title: Mare of Easttown, --- Description: Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dfloro","dateCreated":"2021-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"About Kate Winslet's mastery of accents","reviewBody":"If you think about an actress who has convincingly portrayed characters with distinctive accents, you probably think of Meryl Streep (Sophie's Choice, The Iron Lady, etc.). But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. "</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 10155688, Title: Mare of Easttown, --- Description: Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dfloro","dateCreated":"2021-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"About Kate Winslet's mastery of accents","reviewBody":"If you think about an actress who has convincingly portrayed characters with distinctive accents, you probably think of Meryl Streep (Sophie's Choice, The Iron Lady, etc.). But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dfloro","dateCreated":"2021-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"About Kate Winslet's mastery of accents","reviewBody":"If you think about an actress who has convincingly portrayed characters with distinctive accents, you probably think of Meryl Streep (Sophie's Choice, The Iron Lady, etc.). But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. "</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 10155688, Title: Mare of Easttown, --- Description: Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dfloro","dateCreated":"2021-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"About Kate Winslet's mastery of accents","reviewBody":"If you think about an actress who has convincingly portrayed characters with distinctive accents, you probably think of Meryl Streep (Sophie's Choice, The Iron Lady, etc.). But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. "</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 10155688, Title: Mare of Easttown, --- Description: Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dfloro","dateCreated":"2021-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"About Kate Winslet's mastery of accents","reviewBody":"If you think about an actress who has convincingly portrayed characters with distinctive accents, you probably think of Meryl Streep (Sophie's Choice, The Iron Lady, etc.). But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. But how about Kate Winslet, who has frequently dropped her proper British accent to play, for example, a German woman during wartime (The Reader), an Australian returning home to her small town (The Dressmaker), and a Polish-American business woman (Steve Jobs). Do you know why you don't even remember her characters' accents in these movies? They were so perfect that there was no distraction or indeed reason to bring up the subject. Well, in Mare of Easttown, the regional American accent from an area of Pennsylvania is dead on! Again. And combined with her interaction with Jean Smart (who proved she could handle another regional American accent on the Designing Women '80s TV show), who believably plays her mother here, it's another masterful turn of voice & phrase for Ms. Winslet. She won an Emmy for playing the title character in a previous HBO miniseries, Mildred Pierce, so the Emmy voters better be ready to sharpen their pencils once again for her this time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98905,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. From creator and writer Brad Ingelsby ("The Way Back"), with all episodes directed by Craig Zobel (HBO’s "The Leftovers"), the seven-part limited series is an exploration into the dark side of a close community and an authentic examination of how family and past tragedies can define our present. "</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 3012698, Title: Olive Kitteridge, --- Description: Olive Kitteridge: With Frances McDormand, Richard Jenkins, Ken Cheeseman, Ann Dowd. A middle-school math teacher Olive and her marriage with Henry which spans 25 years." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3012698/","name":"Olive Kitteridge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzOTk4NzMzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTczMzY4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-school math teacher Olive and her marriage with Henry which spans 25 years.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3012698/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Red_Identity","dateCreated":"2014-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing work","reviewBody":"This is an extra-ordinary piece of television. Where so many mini-series are constantly driven by a thread that drives it forward with momentum, this doesn't have that same urgency, which allows it to explore its themes in a way I don't think many TV series or mini-series have done. It's so wonderfully crafted, in all aspects. But really, it's the writing and performances where its true power soars. The acting is magnificent, McDormand might've just outdone her work in Fargo. A truly soulful, aching, incredibly heartfelt performance. We see Olive and her various flaws, and yet we can't help but sympathize with her and like her despite everything she does. The mark of a true revelation. Kind of hard to describe in words, but the acclaim is justified.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-11-02","keywords":"tv mini series,pulitzer prize source,male female relationship,husband wife relationship,depression","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000531/","name":"Frances McDormand","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154914/","name":"Ken Cheeseman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0527847/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi234204953","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ1MzYwMjgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODg3MzY4MjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ1MzYwMjgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODg3MzY4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the official trailer for HBO's upcoming miniseries "Olive Kitteridge"."</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0348914, Title: Deadwood, --- Description: Deadwood: Created by David Milch. With Timothy Olyphant, Ian McShane, Molly Parker, Brad Dourif. A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0348914/","name":"Deadwood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJhMjUzMDYtNzc4MS00Nzk2LTkyMGQtN2M5NTczYTZmYmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU3MTc5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0348914/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"smokehill retrievers","dateCreated":"2004-03-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rough, gritty, realistic portrayal of Western history","reviewBody":"Judging by other comments, the realistic portrayal of the crude language and immorality may be a bit too much for those used to tame, glossy horse operas where the Good are very, very good and the Bad are very, very bad.

As for the language being "over the top," anyone who's spent time in an Army unit or aboard ship in wartime knows this is EXACTLY the kind of language young men under stress use, and probably even worse back in the late eighteenth century when most of them were uneducated, illiterate and had a projected life span of around 30. If they were lucky.

Most people familiar with authentic Western history will recognize this as a very accurate portrayal of Deadwood, or any other frontier boom town, with all its ugliness and warts. Like it or not, it's history. I think they did a superlative job so far (first two episodes).It also looks like it's going to be the most accurate version of Bill Hickock's death -- which was far more than just the simple barroom murder usually portrayed -- ever put on film.

The number of truly spectacular actors here is simply staggering. Ian McShane's riveting performance is no surprise for "Lovejoy" fans; he was long overdue for something equal to his talent. Who else stands out? Damn near everyone. Calamity Jane, Tolliver, Farnum, the Doc ... there aren't enough "supporting actor" awards from any source that could do justice to such a large, stand-out cast. For those of us who despair of the putrid crap in the theaters, peopled by actors who should be doing dinner theater in Dubuque, well... now we have hope. And DEADWOOD truly puts the lie to the propaganda about public broadcasting being necessary to provide "quality programming that commercial television just can't or won't do." In the entire history of public radio and TV they have NEVER reached this level of excellence even once -- yet cable (once referred to disparagingly as 'pay TV') pulls it off on a shoestring budget. Score one for capitalism.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":99072,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2004-03-21","keywords":"saloon,profanity,violence,outlaw,greed","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648249/","name":"Timothy Olyphant","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0574534/","name":"Ian McShane","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0662504/","name":"Molly Parker"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586965/","name":"David Milch"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Deadwood: The Complete First Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi698417433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRjMWI1Y2UtMzMxMS00MDI0LTg5YWItNGMzM2VmYzZiNzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRjMWI1Y2UtMzMxMS00MDI0LTg5YWItNGMzM2VmYzZiNzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Pest
La peste
programme.sub-title: S2 E4 S2 E4 Eugenia

credits.actor: Pablo Molinero, Paco Leon, Sergio Castellanos, Fede Aguado, Luis Callejo

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 5868826, Title: La peste, --- Description: La peste: Created by Rafael Cobos, Alberto Rodríguez. With Pablo Molinero, Patricia López Arnaiz, Sergio Castellanos, Cecilia Gómez. During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races, where 50 different languages were spoken, and all the gold from America arrived into its port. It was one of the smelliest, most beautiful cities in the world, and the setting for this unique, character-driven thriller." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5868826/","name":"La peste","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI0NThlN2MtYTcyYS00MGU1LTgxNzItNTljYzU4MDZjYjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg3NzY0NDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"During a terrible plague epidemic in 16th-century Seville, the corpses of several murdered people are found as an omen of the end of the world. Seville was one of the main cities of the Western world. Known as the Great Babylon, it w","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5868826/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2020-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A peculiar, unique and character-driven thriller with wonderful cinematography and nice acting","reviewBody":"Good but dark series formed by 2 seasons, 12 episodes , being very well set , nicely played and from visual point of view it is magnificent. Spain had become an empire by 1500's under Catholic Kings : Isabel and Fernando , Charles I and after Felipe II , the most poweful country in Europe and all over the world at the time . It is set in Sevilla, 16th century, one of the most marvellous and smelliest cities in the world , it is a time of plague , pursuit , superstition, as well as hyper-religiosity and during a terrible plague epidemic . There appears Mateo Nuñez : Pablo Molinero , he is a condemned by Inquisition, as a high-authority priest named Celso de Guevara : Manolo Solo assigns him to investigate a series of murders happened in the noisy city of Seville where more than forty different languages were spoken and all the gold from America arrived on its por t. In the midst of a dirty atmosphere suffocated by mistrust and betrayals on the order of the day , he will have to discover the author of such astonishing and grisly killings . The second season deals with Mateo Nuñez and Teresa Pinelo : Patricia López Arnaiz , who face off Maria de la O : Stefania de los Santos , and a dangerous and bloody criminal organization, Mafia-alike, called La Garduña operating in Sevilla by human trafficking , prostitution and labouring exploitation.

Nice costumer, dense and painfully realistic mystery thriller with solid performance , enjoyable locations , impeccable scenarios and lavishly filmed. Set in the post-Medieval Seville with its social constitution struck by the plague , it was one of the main cities of the Western world , known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races and people of all kinds and strangest conditions . Do not expect luxurious palaces , sweet Renaissance settings and gorgeous decoration seen in other foreign series such Versalles, The Borgia , Michael Hirst's Tudor or Richard Madden's The Medici. On the contrary, you can appreciate sinister environments , brothels , dirtiness, bowery, city slums and the deepest poverty. As far as I'm concerned the especial writing is pretty well , being its authentic creators Rafael Cobos and Alberto Rodriguez. Convincingly performed by Pablo Molinero as Matthew who investigates the found corpses of several murdered people as an omen of the end of the world . Matthew will have to find out who is the author of a series of diabolical crimes committed against the high places of Sevillian society . Otherwise , he will not find the forgiveness of the Holy Office and the Inquisition as he will decide to investigate it at whatever means. Being finely accompanied by Patricia López Arnaiz as a mysterious factory owner , Paco Tous as her administrator assistant , Paco León, Manolo Solo, Cecilia Gómez, Sergio Castellanos, Manuel Morón , Melina Matthews, Estefania de Santos, Jesús Carroza, Julián Villagrán, Antonio Dechent, Luis Callejo , among others.

It displays an evocative and atmospheric musical score by Julio de la Rosa. It contains picturesque cinematography by cameramen Rau Steve and Andreu Adamo Rubiralta. Shot on several locations as Utrera, Coria del Rio, Dos Hermanas Carmona, Santiponce, Alcala de Guadaira, Gelves, Mairena, Puebla de Rio, Sevilla, Trujillo, Caceres, Palos de la Frontera, Huelva, Cuevas de Almanzora, Almeria, and Toledo. And we can find the real interiors of the Sevillian Palaces, Casa Contratation of Sevilla and sightseeing as the riverside, Giralda, Torre del Oro, Cathedral and other buildings, monuments by means of CGI. This surprising crime drama was well directed by Alberto Rodriguez. He is considered to be one of the best Spanish filmmakers, including notorious films as Grupo 7, Factor Pilgrim, 7 Virgins, The suit , El hombre de las 1000 caras, being his biggest hit : Marshland . Rating : above average, 7/10 for the accuracy in depicting the XVI century city , as the money are not waste, though not for too squeamish watchers due to its sour seeing of poorness, sleazy events, nudism , heinous killings and extreme realism .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1857,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-12","keywords":"plague,murder investigation,death,violence,blood","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1944825/","name":"Pablo Molinero","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3802082/","name":"Patricia López Arnaiz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1525783/","name":"Sergio Castellanos"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296182/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0544623/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1943791/","name":"Rafael Cobos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735705/","name":"Alberto Rodríguez"]</script><metacontent="

Spain had become an empire by 1500's under Catholic Kings : Isabel and Fernando , Charles I and after Felipe II , the most poweful country in Europe and all over the world at the time . It is set in Sevilla, 16th century, one of the most marvellous and smelliest cities in the world , it is a time of plague , pursuit , superstition, as well as hyper-religiosity and during a terrible plague epidemic . There appears Mateo Nuñez : Pablo Molinero , he is a condemned by Inquisition, as a high-authority priest named Celso de Guevara : Manolo Solo assigns him to investigate a series of murders happened in the noisy city of Seville where more than forty different languages were spoken and all the gold from America arrived on its por t. In the midst of a dirty atmosphere suffocated by mistrust and betrayals on the order of the day , he will have to discover the author of such astonishing and grisly killings . The second season deals with Mateo Nuñez and Teresa Pinelo : Patricia López Arnaiz , who face off Maria de la O : Stefania de los Santos , and a dangerous and bloody criminal organization, Mafia-alike, called La Garduña operating in Sevilla by human trafficking , prostitution and labouring exploitation.

Nice costumer, dense and painfully realistic mystery thriller with solid performance , enjoyable locations , impeccable scenarios and lavishly filmed. Set in the post-Medieval Seville with its social constitution struck by the plague , it was one of the main cities of the Western world , known as the Great Babylon, it was home to people of all races and people of all kinds and strangest conditions . Do not expect luxurious palaces , sweet Renaissance settings and gorgeous decoration seen in other foreign series such Versalles, The Borgia , Michael Hirst's Tudor or Richard Madden's The Medici. On the contrary, you can appreciate sinister environments , brothels , dirtiness, bowery, city slums and the deepest poverty. As far as I'm concerned the especial writing is pretty well , being its authentic creators Rafael Cobos and Alberto Rodriguez. Convincingly performed by Pablo Molinero as Matthew who investigates the found corpses of several murdered people as an omen of the end of the world . Matthew will have to find out who is the author of a series of diabolical crimes committed against the high places of Sevillian society . Otherwise , he will not find the forgiveness of the Holy Office and the Inquisition as he will decide to investigate it at whatever means. Being finely accompanied by Patricia López Arnaiz as a mysterious factory owner , Paco Tous as her administrator assistant , Paco León, Manolo Solo, Cecilia Gómez, Sergio Castellanos, Manuel Morón , Melina Matthews, Estefania de Santos, Jesús Carroza, Julián Villagrán, Antonio Dechent, Luis Callejo , among others.

It displays an evocative and atmospheric musical score by Julio de la Rosa. It contains picturesque cinematography by cameramen Rau Steve and Andreu Adamo Rubiralta. Shot on several locations as Utrera, Coria del Rio, Dos Hermanas Carmona, Santiponce, Alcala de Guadaira, Gelves, Mairena, Puebla de Rio, Sevilla, Trujillo, Caceres, Palos de la Frontera, Huelva, Cuevas de Almanzora, Almeria, and Toledo. And we can find the real interiors of the Sevillian Palaces, Casa Contratation of Sevilla and sightseeing as the riverside, Giralda, Torre del Oro, Cathedral and other buildings, monuments by means of CGI. This surprising crime drama was well directed by Alberto Rodriguez. He is considered to be one of the best Spanish filmmakers, including notorious films as Grupo 7, Factor Pilgrim, 7 Virgins, The suit , El hombre de las 1000 caras, being his biggest hit : Marshland . Rating : above average, 7/10 for the accuracy in depicting the XVI century city , as the money are not waste, though not for too squeamish watchers due to its sour seeing of poorness, sleazy events, nudism , heinous killings and extreme realism .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1857,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-12","keywords":"plague,murder investigation,death,violence,blood","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1944825/","name":"Pablo Molinero","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3802082/","name":"Patricia López Arnaiz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1525783/","name":"Sergio Castellanos"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296182/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0544623/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1943791/","name":"Rafael Cobos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735705/","name":"Alberto Rodríguez"]</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0421030, Title: Big Love, --- Description: Big Love: Created by Mark V. Olsen, Will Scheffer. With Bill Paxton, Jeanne Tripplehorn, Chloë Sevigny, Ginnifer Goodwin. A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0421030/","name":"Big Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjEzNTE0Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM3MDAzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A polygamist and his relationship with his three wives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0421030/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rogue-32","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tricky premise, handled with charm","reviewBody":"I was curious about this series because I like Paxton, Sevigny and Tina Majorino in particular, and also Harry Dean Stanton (whom I got to see play blues at the Mint, in L.A., a couple of years ago - got his autograph that night as well, which was very cool). I don't agree with 'the principle', but I do like the series.\n\nThey've taken a potentially combustible premise and managed to make it charming and almost 'normal' - after a few episodes, it didn't seem odd at all that Bill has more than one wife. I like the interaction between the characters, the women in particular, and the side-story involving Bruce Dern is hilarious and tragic at the same time. They're walking a fine line here, and I would say, after viewing 2 seasons' worth of episodes now, they're pulling it off magnificently.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20762,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-03-12","keywords":"polygamist,large family,gay mormon,polygamy,secret","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000675/","name":"Jeanne Tripplehorn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001721/","name":"Chloë Sevigny"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050662/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0647739/","name":"Mark V. Olsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770504/","name":"Will Scheffer"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Big Love","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2768149273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjgyMTExM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQ0NzUzNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A critic's trailer for the HBO drama "Big Love," now airing its final season."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0413573, Title: Grey's Anatomy, --- Description: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"HaloFive00","dateCreated":"2006-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Addictive show","reviewBody":"Grey's Anatomy is a surprisingly addictive show. The plot lines are an interesting blend of soap opera, drama, and comedy--it's not really like anything else, but at the same time, it occasionally feels pedestrian. However, it's very well done--good writing, great acting, and well directed. \n\nSandra Oh stands out for her comic timing, but the entire cast is superb. It's not as grave as ER, but is just as compelling. Also, it's a little more accessible than ER and some of the more serious medical dramas. The show is definitely worth catching--if you can't watch it when it airs, TiVo it or rent the first season DVD. It's well worth the time spent! It's great for marathon viewings!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":270305,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. Between the NYC mayor, an unrelenting NYPD officer and clients old and new, Ray struggles to find a balance between fixing for clients and fixing himself. Premieres November 17 at 8/7c. Starring Liev Schreiber and Jon Voight."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80309,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old.
